title: StrangeLetter

The band was founded by Steven James Bayless, the driving creative force behind the project and a self described Ã¢â‚¬Å“obsessive perfectionist.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ An avid producer and recording engineer, Bayless spent 5 years developing StrangeletterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sound in his Portland home studio, carving out what would become StrangeletterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s self-titled debut album Ã¢â‚¬â€œ released independently in the fall of 2009. In it, Bayless channels his anxieties, dreams, and paranoiac tendencies on this 12-track epic, exploring themes of a fractured, disintegrating world, the desire for new beginnings, madness, mania, serenity, and the indelible tenacity and spirit ingrained in humanityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s collective unconscious.
